title: Chinese Takeout Thresh
body: Okay so I realize that Blood Moon Thresh has yet to come out (soon to be) BUT I've been sitting on this one for a while. I don't have it all planned out, maybe I'll sketch something up later. Anyhow, his lantern is a takeout box, his hook is a noodle. How does this not seem perfect. Please post your thoughts :D and yes I'm hungry after typing this up.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=TheDrakonz,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=ZfJjlGrE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-01T11:17:38.545+0000)
>
> Pretty funny idea! Could work.

Sadly Rito would never make a skin like this because of the racism.
His Box is obviously a doggie bag, complete with self-wrapping walls.
